QuestData.Title: Maurin's Concoction
QuestData.Description: <Maurin carefully seals his concoction into the hollow kodo horns.>$b$bHere you are, $c.$b$bBring these to Karnum. It's up to him how he wants to use them on the naga. $b$bI'll be watching to gauge the effectiveness of my formula!
QuestData.LogDescription: Maurin wants you to deliver Maurin's Concoction to Karnum at Karnum's Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: I hate to use such unnatural measures, but I fear we simply have no choice....
